meanings.sent1: The old ship was decommissioned after many years of service.
meanings.sent2: The government decided to decommission the outdated power plant.
meanings.sent3: The decommissioned robot started a new life as a museum exhibit.
meanings.sent4: After the war, the soldiers were decommissioned and returned to civilian life.
meanings.sent5: The decommissioned aircraft carrier stood silent and still in the harbor.

meanings.sent1: The decommissioned factory was a reminder of the town's industrial past.
meanings.sent2: The decommissioned phone booth was now just a relic of the past.
meanings.sent3: The decommissioned playground equipment found new life as art installations.
meanings.sent4: Her decommissioned laptop served as a paperweight on the desk.
meanings.sent5: The decommissioned train tracks were overgrown with weeds and wildflowers.
